lines.text: You believe in Jesus?
Yes, I do.
Well, you're gonna meet him.
[Paul shoots Stomper dead]
It's my turn now man.
You want her, take her in the bedroom.
Hey Jiver, save some for me man!
Nirvana, you want a bit?
Any left?
There's enough.
Don't worry
[grabbing his pants to male tourist]
I'll be good.
We just thought we'd bring Mr. Kersey's wallet back.
Personally.
Look at this. Isn't this prreetty?
Lady, you scream and disturb the neighbors, we'll cut you into little pieces and eat you for dinner!
[last lines]
Are you free tomorrow, Paul?
Of course. What else would I be doing?
[we hear several gunshots on Skid Row and the end credits roll]

Let me get this straight... you and your wife were attacked by four muggers and then all of a sudden this guy comes out from nowhere and begins shooting, killing these two here... and you don't know what he looks like?
He saved our lives dammit! Where were you, giving out parking tickets?
I want a description of that guy looked like!
He was a very good citizen!
I don't care! He was a killer!

[after getting caught killing Charles 'Nivana' Wilson]
He raped and killed my daughter.
I know. I know who you are, Mr. Kersey. I read about that in the newspapers.
[after a short pause]
I'll give you three minutes before I sound the alarm.

[caught off guard]
Why are you doing this?
You're wasting time.

[Noticing the cross on Nirvana's neck]
You believe in Jesus.

[Nervously because Paul Kersey has a gun pointed at him]
Yes, I do.
Well, you're going to meet him.
[then he shoots Nirvana]
Where's my wallet?
I ain't got it!
Okay, lady. Quietly now... do it niiice.
